entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
